description:
A package of Syncfusion Blazor Components.
List of Components:
•   Button
•   CheckBox
•   RadioButton
•   Chips
•   Switch

Button:
The Button is a graphical user interface element that triggers an event on its click action.

Key features:
  •	Predefined Styles - Provided with predefined styles of Button.
  •	Sizes - Provided with different sizes of Button.
  •	Icons - Supports text and icon on the Button.

Helpful links:
Feature Tour: https://www.syncfusion.com/blazor-components/blazor-button
Documentation: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/documentation/button/
Demos: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/demos/buttons/default-functionalities

CheckBox:
The CheckBox is a graphical user interface element that allows you to select one or more options from the choices.

Key features:
  •	Label - Supports label and its positioning.
  •	Sizes - Provided with different sizes of CheckBox.

Helpful links:
Feature Tour: https://www.syncfusion.com/blazor-components/blazor-checkbox
Documentation: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/documentation/check-box/
Demos: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/demos/buttons/checkbox

Chips: 
The Blazor Chips is a feature-rich component that provides small blocks of text information.

Key features:
• Action Chips - Compact elements for representing simple content and can also trigger actions when selected.
• Choice Chips - Collection of chips that allow users to filter the view items based on their choices.
• Filter Chips - A chip can be created from text provided by the user in an input box or deleted as needed.
  
Helpful links:
Feature tour: https://www.syncfusion.com/blazor-components/blazor-chips
Documentation: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/documentation/chip/
Demos: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/demos/chips/default-functionalities

RadioButton:
The RadioButton is a graphical user interface element that allows you to select one option from the choices.

Key features:
  •	Label - Supports label and its positioning.
  •	Sizes - Provided with different sizes of RadioButton.

Helpful links:
Feature Tour: https://www.syncfusion.com/blazor-components/blazor-radio-button
Documentation: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/documentation/radio-button/
Demos: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/demos/buttons/radio-button

Switch:
The Switch is a graphical user interface element that allows you to toggle between checked and unchecked states.

Key features:
  •	Text - Supports text.
  •	Sizes - Provided with different sizes of Switch.

Helpful links:
Feature Tour: https://www.syncfusion.com/blazor-components/blazor-toggle-switch-button
Documentation: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/documentation/toggle-switch-button/
Demos: https://blazor.syncfusion.com/demos/buttons/toggle-switch-button

Support:
